p: Biological activities were also determined for another structural type of derivatives of (–)-borneol. One of the examples is 1,7,7-trimethylbicyclo[2.2.1]hept-2-yl methane sulfonate 145 ( Figure 42), obtained from the reaction of (1 S)- endo-(–)-borneol with methanesulfonyl chloride [ 118]. The antibacterial effect of compound 145 is comparable with that of the commonly used reference—chloramphenicol.
